name: For Fox Sake (itch) (Prisma Games)
description:
This game was made as a part of the IPKO Foundation 2023 Game Jam, where the theme was "Far From Home".

Play as a fox who's stranded in an island with a damaged boat. Find the necessary resources to repair your boat and sail back into the ocean by overcoming mountains of obstacles with jumps and dashes!

Keybinds:

[W] [A] [S] [D] - Movement
[Space] - Jump / Double-Jump
[LShift] - Dash
